attributes.action: admit that online petitioning is about as likely to change anything as running at a brick wall
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: On line petitions are a waste of time and about as likely to bring about political change as banging your head against a brick wall. After reading some of the rubbish on this site  I believe that there are some here who should "get a life" I suggest organising a general strike if you really want them to take notice. This is not a joke but I guess it will be banned anyway.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
